item.title: Report E-2025020059
item.description:
Report E-2025020059

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-10T06:19:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-03
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On February 3, 2025, three (3) 5-gallon pails of paint were damaged and released approximately five (5) gallons of paint to the trailer interior and pavement beneath. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Environmental Restoration, LLC (ER) to remediate the site. The crew utilized absorbents and hand tools to remove all spent product. All debris was containerized in one (1) 55-gallon drum and the damaged pails were placed in one (1) 55-gallon drum.
